text:
London, UK - Full Time. Busuu are currently looking for:

DevOps - https://www.busuu.com/jobs?gh_jid=88545 Backend Developers - https://www.busuu.com/jobs?gh_jid=72385 Test Automation Engineers - https://www.busuu.com/jobs?gh_jid=85281

busuu is the world’s largest social network for learning languages, with over 55 million users around the world.

From solving difficult engineering challenges, building out tech integrations with our partners around the world, evolving our products and continuing to lead the way, we’re certain you’ll be pushed professionally and have fun along the way.

If interested please contact me at natalina@busuu.com with a copy of your CV.
